raw_body: SOMALINGAM – SELVADURAI – Beloved husband of Mrs. Suhenthra Somalingam,​ loving father of Wamanan (Canada),​ Vaheesan (Australia),​ affectionate father-in-law of Rashika,​ Anita (Australia),​ loving brother of Wigneswaran and late Sivakumaan,​ beloved grandfather of Anaya and Jeremiah,​ passed away on 06th January 2024. Remains lie at Mahinda Funeral Parlour for viewing on January 8 from 8.30 a.m. Final rites will commence at 11.30 a.m. Thereafter,​ cremation will take place at the General Cemetery in Mount Lavinia at 2.00 p.m.002197
